Export.Routine:
WWWSTOP #include COMSYS ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; STOP HTML SEITE ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; SET YNOFOOT=1 ==> KEINE FUSSNOTE ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 11-Dec-2009 GRF SR16871: get data once; macros ; 19-Nov-2009 shobby SR17032: Disabled 'NumberOfHits' functionality. ; 07-May-2007 GRF SR15511: Doco; quits ; 03-May-2006 Steve S SR14592: End the div ; 03.06.1998 DT (C) BY DITMAR TYBUSSEK ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idNewForm,objForm,objSystem,strData,strEmail,strKey set objSystem = $get(^WWW012(0,0,1)) ; Display footer? ;--------------------------------------- IF $GET(YFORM)="" SET YNOFOOT=1 IF $GET(YNOFOOT)="" IF $GET(YFORM)'="" DO . set objForm = $get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)) . SET YNOFOOT=1 . IF $$$WWW120PageEndWithDateAndTime(objForm)=$$$YES SET YNOFOOT="" QUIT . IF $$$WWW120InheritCompanyProperties(objForm)=$$$YES DO . . IF $$$WWW012PageEndWithDateAndTime(objSystem)=$$$YES SET YNOFOOT="" ;IF YBEDBER=1 WRITE YCR,"" ; FIXME : Doesn't close HTML on early exit - is this right? IF $GET(YUSER)'="" IF +$$$WWWUSERHTMLStarted($GET(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)))=$$$NO DO QUIT ; *** EARLY EXIT *** . SET $$$WWWUSERHTMLStarted(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)) = 0 ;HTML AUS . SET $$$WWWUSERBODYStarted(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)) = 0 ;BODY AUS . SET $$$WWWUSERFormStarted(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)) = 0 ;FORMULAR AUS ;form . SET $$$WWWUSERFormHeaderDisplayed(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)) = 0 ;KOPF AUS ;heading . SET $$$WWWUSERLastSave(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)) = "" ;SAVE . SET YNOFOOT = 1 IF (YFIXHEADER'=1) && ($GET(YNOFOOT)="") DO . NEW HELP . SET HELP=0 . IF $FIND(","_$TRANSLATE($$^WWWBEDBER(YBED),";",",")_",",",1,") SET HELP=1 . ;WRITE "
" . WRITE "" . WRITE "[" . IF HELP=1 DO ;FIS; HILFE FÜR ADMIN: ANZEIGE NAME . . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE YBED . IF HELP=1 WRITE "" . WRITE ", " . IF HELP=1 DO ;FIS; HILFE FÜR ADMIN: ANZEIGE TAGESZAHL . . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE $$^WWWDATE($HOROLOG) . IF HELP=1 WRITE "" . WRITE ", " . WRITE $$^WWWTIME($HOROLOG) . WRITE "][" . set strEmail = $$$WWW012EMailForHelp(objSystem) . IF strEmail'="" DO . . WRITE "" . . write strEmail . . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "]" . WRITE "" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"",YCR IF $GET(YUSER)'="" DO . IF $GET(YFORM)'="" SET ^WWWPAGE(0,YUSER,YFORM,1) = $GET(YSEITE)_Y_$GET(YINSEITE) ;SEITENWERTE SPEICHERN ;Save . QUIT:'$DATA(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER)) . SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,5) = 0 ;HTML AUS ; $$$WWWUSERHTMLStarted . SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,6) = 0 ;BODY AUS . SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,9) = 0 ;FORMULAR AUS ;form . SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,10) = 0 ;KOPF AUS ;heading . SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,22) = "" ;SAVE . LOCK +^WWWSOR(YUSER,"PAGE"):2 ;CHECK AUF SEITE;TYBD;19,12,2003 . LOCK -^WWWSOR(YUSER,"PAGE") . KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER) DO CLOSE^WWWSTART QUIT
